Team","details":"Stores ownership and resolver information for all .sel domains.      Implements EIP-137 compatible registry interface.  Key concepts: - Node: A bytes32 identifier computed via namehash algorithm (EIP-137) - Owner: Address that controls a node (can update resolver, transfer ownership) - Resolver: Contract that stores records for a node (addresses, text, etc.) - TTL: Time-to-live hint for caching (not enforced on-chain) - Operator: Address approved to manage all nodes owned by another address  Inspired by ENS (Ethereum Name Service) - adapted for Selendra","kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"SNS Registry","version":1},"userdoc":{"events":{"ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool)":{"notice":"Emitted when operator approval is changed"},"NewOwner(bytes32,bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a new subnode owner is set"},"NewResolver(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when a node's resolver is updated"},"NewTTL(bytes32,uint64)":{"notice":"Emitted when a node's TTL is updated"},"Transfer(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"Emitted when node ownership is transferred"}},"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"The core registry contract for Selendra Naming Service (.sel domains)","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/SNSRegistry.sol":"ISNSRegistry"},"evmVersion":"london","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/",":ds-test/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/forge-std/lib/ds-test/src/",":erc4626-tests/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/erc4626-tests/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":openzeppelin-contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"src/SNSRegistry.sol":{"keccak256":"0x7cf94f9408b593f3f2d8a9911f6e06adcdb19c89999f8922ae237976863b3d4b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://96fe5b692b77f6ea4009077e380a0fc4500f67c5d230d6de184901f01f2c95d4","dweb:/ipfs/QmYFWfp4Hr5ECE8kQhdgcV47diENFGGn1GznPBKQKrrRXu"]}},"version":1}
